paragraph: Bradley L. Williamson, (November 21, 1927 â€“ December 25, 2013) known professionally as Slim Williamson, was an American record executive who owned several record labels. He purchased the Chart label in 1964 from Gary Walker for $350.00. He died on December 25, 2013.
Sugar Hill Records (Not affiliated with the Rap or Bluegrass labels of the same name)
